name: Crystal Crush
description:
Introducing Crystal Crush, a match game with a bit of a twist. Featuring three different game modes, Crystal Crush will engage you with music, skill, and a bit of luck. The premise is simple: you are in control of Crystals in a column with a press of a button. Match 3 or more in the target row (at the bottom, just above the buttons) to score! Multiple matches in a row increase your score multiplier for even more points!

==Arcade Mode==
Advance through 40 levels to match predetermined sets of Crystals. Watch out though, match a bomb and it will blow up! Match too many bombs and the game is over.

==Timed Mode==
Score as many points as you can before the clock runs out! Use Power-ups to increase your score or add time to the clock. Can you beat your high score?

==Crush Mode==
How long can you go? Choose your moves carefully and plan ahead in this "Endless" mode and see how many points you can get!

Crystal Crush is a Universal app so it supports iPad/iPad 2, Retina displays, as well as iPhone and iPod devices. It also has Game Center Leaderboards for each mode with local and online achievements to show off your skill.

Please let us know what you think of our first App!
